title: __VU is always zero in 0.17.0
body:
The virtual user id `__VU` is not assigned in 0.17.0

```javascript
import { sleep } from "k6";
export default function() {
    console.log(`__VU=${__VU}`);
    sleep(1)
}
```

```
$ docker run --rm -i loadimpact/k6:0.17.0 run -u 2 -d 3s - < simple.js

          /\      |‾‾|  /‾‾/  /‾/
     /\  /  \     |  |_/  /  / /
    /  \/    \    |      |  /  ‾‾\
   /          \   |  |‾\  \ | (_) |
  / __________ \  |__|  \__\ \___/  Welcome to k6 v0.17.0!

  execution: local
     output: -
     script: - (js)

   duration: 3s, iterations: 0
        vus: 2, max: 2

    web ui: http://0.0.0.0:6565/

time="2017-07-11T10:34:04Z" level=info msg="__VU=0"
time="2017-07-11T10:34:04Z" level=info msg="__VU=0"
[running   ] 1s / 3s
time="2017-07-11T10:34:05Z" level=info msg="__VU=0"
time="2017-07-11T10:34:05Z" level=info msg="__VU=0"
[running   ] 2s / 3s
time="2017-07-11T10:34:06Z" level=info msg="__VU=0"
time="2017-07-11T10:34:06Z" level=info msg="__VU=0"
[done      ] 3s / 3s

    data_received...: 0 B (0 B/s)
    data_sent.......: 0 B (0 B/s)
    vus.............: 2
    vus_max.........: 2
```

Isn't it wrong behavior?
`__VU` is undocumented but it is mentioned in some issues and useful.

In 0.16.0, it works properly.

```
$ docker run --rm -i loadimpact/k6:0.16.0 run -u 2 -d 3s - < simple.js

          /\      |‾‾|  /‾‾/  /‾/
     /\  /  \     |  |_/  /  / /
    /  \/    \    |      |  /  ‾‾\
   /          \   |  |‾\  \ | (_) |
  / __________ \  |__|  \__\ \___/  Welcome to k6 v0.16.0!

  execution: local
     output: -
     script: - (js)

   duration: 3s, iterations: 0
        vus: 2, max: 2

    web ui: http://0.0.0.0:6565/

time="2017-07-11T10:33:32Z" level=info msg="__VU=1"
time="2017-07-11T10:33:32Z" level=info msg="__VU=2"
[running   ] 1s / 3s
time="2017-07-11T10:33:33Z" level=info msg="__VU=1"
time="2017-07-11T10:33:33Z" level=info msg="__VU=2"
[running   ] 2s / 3s
time="2017-07-11T10:33:34Z" level=info msg="__VU=1"
time="2017-07-11T10:33:34Z" level=info msg="__VU=2"
[done      ] 3s / 3s

    data_received...: 0 B (0 B/s)
    data_sent.......: 0 B (0 B/s)
    iterations......: 4 (1.3333333333333333/s)
    vus.............: 2
    vus_max.........: 2
```
